PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-07822007-05-11,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MARGARET E. SMITH of Amherst, Nova Scotia, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology to hold office during pleasure for a term ending June 29, 2008, in the place of Paul Benoit, who has resigned.
AttachmentsAttachment
